Class InventoryGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraft.client.gui.Gui
      • net.minecraft.client.gui.GuiScreen
        • net.minecraft.client.gui.inventory.GuiContainer
          • com.JasonILTG.ScienceMod.gui.general.InventoryGUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.minecraft.client.gui.GuiYesNoCallback
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GeneratorGUI, JarLauncherGUI, MachineGUI

    public class InventoryGUI
extends net.minecraft.client.gui.inventory.GuiContainer
    Wrapper class for all GUIs for inventories in ScienceMod.
    Author:
    JasonILTG and syy1125

    • Method Detail

      • drawPartial

        public void drawPartial(net.minecraft.util.ResourceLocation img,
                        int x,
                        int y,
                        int width,
                        int height,
                        int current,
                        int max,
                        int fromDir,
                        net.minecraft.util.ResourceLocation opposite)
        Draws a part of the the given image based on the fraction of current/max from the given direction. Also draws the opposite from the opposite end to cover the part not drawn. Used for drawing progress bars, tanks, etc.
        Parameters:
        img - The image
        x - The x-position in the GUI
        y - The y-position in the GUI
        width - The width
        height - The height
        current - The current amount
        max - The maximum amount
        fromDir - The direction to start drawing from
        opposite - The image to draw from the opposite end
